place_of_publication.publication_title: in War Department [U.S.], Pacif. Railr. Rep.

taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family Asteraceae;tribe Heliantheae;subtribe Chaenactidinae;genus Chaenactis;species glabriuscula;variety megacephala;

bio:treatment.discussion: Variety megacephala is known mainly from the southern Sierra Nevada foothills and adjacent San Joaquin Valley and Transverse Ranges; it intergrades extensively with vars. lanosa and glabriuscula. A specimen cited by P. Stockwell (1940) from Bingen, Klickitat County, Washington (Suksdorf, May 1907) was not checked; it is either misidentified or from an introduction that did not persist.
